characters: Driver of the orange car, driver of the white truck, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. An orange car is ahead in the same lane, and a white truck is in the adjacent lane. A motorcyclist appears on the right side of the road towards the end of the segment.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while following the orange car. The white truck in the adjacent lane is moving at a similar speed. The motorcyclist on the right side of the road appears to be moving towards the road, potentially causing a need for caution.
key_objects: 1) Front: An orange car, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Left: A white truck, approximately 15 meters away, moving at a similar speed. 3) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the road.
